title: "My Balls Got Caught (In The Hay Baler)". Rare Gem Found: The Song That Shocked Farmers in 1978

tasks.task: Remove caught body parts from hay baler
subtasks: Access the hay baler from behind
Carefully inspect the baler to locate the trapped area
Using gloves, safely reach inside the baler to free the trapped testicles
Once freed, check for injuries and provide first aid if necessary
Report the equipment malfunction to the appropriate individual or department
Activate emergency stop button or levers to shut down the baler immediately
Alert nearby colleagues or farm workers about the incident

tasks.task: Assess physical injuries received from the incident
subtasks: Look for signs of bruising or tearing
Determine if medical attention is needed
Apply first aid measures such as immobilization or cleaning wounds
Call for help from nearby individuals if possible
Contact a veterinarian or medical professional if the injuries are severe

tasks.task: Document the incident for safety and insurance purposes
subtasks: Note down the time, location, and circumstances of the incident
Take photos or videos if safe to do so without further risk
Report the incident to the farm's safety officer or supervisor
